item.text: The Lord said to me, “Go, show love to your wife again, even though she loves another man and continually commits adultery. Likewise, the Lord loves the Israelites although they turn to other gods and love to offer raisin cakes to idols.”

So I <st data-num="03739" class="">paid</st> <st data-num="02568 06240">15</st> shekels of <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> and <st data-num="02563 03963">about seven bushels</st> of <st data-num="08184 08184">barley</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03739" class="">to purchase</st> her.

Then I <st data-num="0559 0413">told</st> her, “You must <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> with me <st data-num="07227" class="">many</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days;</st> you must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="02181" class="">commit adultery</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">or</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">become joined</st> to another <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st>,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> <st data-num="01571" class="">also</st> will wait <st data-num="0413" class="">for</st> you.”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="03588" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st><n id="1" /> must <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> <st data-num="07227" class="">many</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st> <st data-num="0369" class="">without</st> a <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> <st data-num="0369" class="">or</st> <st data-num="08269" class="">prince</st>, <st data-num="0369" class="">without</st> <st data-num="02077" class="">sacrifice</st> <st data-num="0369" class="">or</st> <st data-num="04676" class="">sacred fertility pillar</st>, <st data-num="0369" class="">without</st> <st data-num="0646" class="">ephod</st> or <st data-num="08655" class="">idols</st>.
Afterward, the Israelites will turn and seek the Lord their God and their Davidic king. Then they will submit to the Lord in fear and receive his blessings in future days.
